categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars Galaxies

nodes.text: Taron was a male Trade Federation loyalist who lived during the time of the Galactic Civil War.

Dialogue pertaining to Taron appeared in the directory tree files for the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided. However, he is not known to have appeared on the video game's live servers as a proper non-player character.
